Description: Red granite naophorous figure of a priest; Hieroglyphic text on the shrine; unfinished.
Curator's comments: Hall, JEA 16: 167-8 Bothmer, ESLP: 7 Published: PM IV, p.32 Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 15 Published: HTBM Part 5: Plate 13
The inscription is not contemporary with the statue. It would appear to be a pseudo MK or FIP text
To be included in the 'Musee achemenide virtuel et interactif' (see www.achemenet.com).
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed 2015-2016 27 May-10th Apr, Québec, Le Musée de la Civilisation, Egyptian Magic.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
